main event: An unidentified flying object was reported off the Pacific coast of the USA on 6 June 1952, described as a brilliant light in a circular shape.
interesting points: The object was approximately 30 feet in diameter and exhibited a brilliant light,It was observed at a specific time of 0940 Pacific War Time,The sighting lasted for 20-30 minutes,The object was sighted by a passenger on a Pan American Liner,The report comes from the Office Pacific Consultant USA.
sighted object: brilliant light, circular, about 30 feet in diameter
